name: sonship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the position of being a son, especially the son of God in the Christian religion: The older son who stayed at home and met his responsibilities is experiencing the joy and privilege of sonship. Christ is the Son of God in the perfect sense of sonship. The Divine Sonship of Jesus is explained in the gospel of John. Related word
